s_synopsis: Choose your favorite game systems from "Samurai Shodown" to "Samurai Shodown V" in order to battle in the most advantageous way to victory! Characters from all previous installments and additional brand new characters including "Iroha", "Ochamaro", "Andrew" and "Sugoroku" have gathered for this gorgeous 6th opus! The official notice of the Sunpu tournament in the shogunate presence was first announced in Edo, and word quickly spread to various lands, finally becoming familiar news throughout the world. The age: Tenmei. The venue: The world. The prize: Glory. The curtain now rises on the samurai world's greatest specacle... "En garde! Let the games begin!"
